definition[0]: a game played between two teams of players who ride on horses and hit a small ball with long-handled wooden hammers
definition[1]: a type of hard, round, white sweet sold in the UK, which tastes of mint and has a hole in the middle. Advertisements for Polos use the phrase ‘Polo, the mint with a hole’.
definition[2]: a type of small car made by the German company Volkswagen
